Class OpSendSensorSettings

java.lang.Object

us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.dr500.OpDR500
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.dr500.OpSendSensorSettings
public class OpSendSensorSettings extends OpDR500
Controller operation to send settings to a DR-500.

Douglas Lau
